attributes.action: Stop the military intervention in Syria, the British people don't want another war!
attributes.additional_details:
We, as a country, do not want to put our troops, or our national security at risk by getting involved in yet another war that has no concern to us.
Much like the Afghan police was infiltrated by Muslim extremists, we do not know that the governments military has not been infiltrated by 'covert rebels', who have access to chemical weapons.
The facts are too clouded!
We should not let us, Great Britain, become war puppets of the USA.

It is not our war to fight. Keep our resources, and military focused on efforts within the United Kingdom.. Not abroad!
